description: Excellent program & very powerful tool. 4 stars only, because it need to add just few enhancements .... But, unfortunately, it's developer stop from developing it ! Very sad for such great tool, being stop from adding new features & enhancements ....
summary: Need few enhancements to be 5 stars

description:
Old but gold.
This app does a lot of edit PDF tasks that you can't find in other graphical libre apps.
One of the rare pdf manipulation tool that allows, for example, to add page numbers or to change the table of contents for the pdf file.
summary: Very powerful interface to the itextpdf library

description: I just keep on keeping on coming back to it again and again and again...
Alles drin, alles dran. Und das offline, -> bester Datenschutz!! gegenüber "online-PDF-tools". (better data protection!! and more features - opposite to online tools)
summary: All in One - simply perfect, best data protection!

description: Es una gran decepción. No sirve para proteger documentos contra copia o impresión, aunque tiene estas funciones que supuestamente se pueden activar o desactivar, pero no funcionan; solo evita su edición. Es una lástima. Hoy mismo lo voy a desinstalar de mi computador.
Es una Herramienta interesante pero ni pude usar es complicada no tiene ayuda los comandos son dificil de entenderen fin si alguien la sabe usar agradesco enseñar
